channel.title: [667/718] Grand Exchange
channel.description:
In this Snippet i'm going to teach you guys, how to disable buying rares from the Grand Exchange.
Data -> Items -> Grand Exchange -> unbuyables.txt
Okay now you'll have to add the [u]NAME[/u] of the item you don't want to sell in the grand exchange.
[code] red h'ween mask [/code]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/20f9661.png[/img]
Thank-you alot for using my Snippet!

item.title: [667/718] Grand Exchange
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“NukeRune, post:3, topic:528451”][quote author=whattehp406 link=topic=647205.msg4352550#msg4352550 date=1376925471]
This is good but it might be better to remove the unbuyables from the GE list so you can’t even select it.
[/quote]

I don’t think it’s possible, anyways I think this is much better idea![/quote]its fucking possible you make an array with the items, and make the search ignore those
lawl

Read full topic
